Address.value: 20 CECIL STREET 04-03,PLUS BUILDING SINGAPORE, SINGAPORE, 049705, Singapore

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Hotel101 Global Holdings Corp. ("HBNB") is an asset-light, prop-tech hospitality platform business designed for rapid global growth. Hotel101 generates revenue twice, first in the form of upfront revenue from the sale of its standardized hotel units to global real estate unit buyers and second in the form of recurring revenues from long-term contracts for the day-to-day management and operation of these hotel units enrolled on the Hotel101 platform. HBNB believes the Hotel101 asset-light business model is unique and will allow it to efficiently redeploy capital from real estate unit sales in existing developments to new hotel expansion projects, and is designed to deliver a significant multi-year global growth plan targeting openings in 25 priority countries in the medium term. Hotel101 aims to establish a global footprint in 100 countries over the long term. HBNB is the global hotel expansion arm of the Philippine-based DoubleDragon Corporation.
